children.name: Introduction
Investigate your Automation Opportunities

blocks.text: This Dashboard focus on the level of automation in a standard Invoice-to-Pay process. This breakdown can be used to identify process automation potential.
Structure of the Dashboard
Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a Process Discovery Widget and a Total Cost Estimation of Manual Posting Item Creation
Page 2 - Deep Dive: Overview of automated vs manual events in the current data set, Automation Recommender, Automation by Plant, RPA Bots and Company
Page 3 - Case Data: Overview of all individual Case Details
Page 4 - Actions: Offers a summary of different recommendations based on the degree of automation
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

children.name: Feedback Request

blocks.text: If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: Calculation of automated and manual events

blocks.text:
Considered attribute (event Level): 
In the Dashboard, manual and automated events are included. This calculation is based on the event level attribute  Event Created By User Type.

Calculation and meaning of values:
The value of the attribute Event Created By User Type can either be dialog which indicates a manual event or system /service which indicates an automated event. If neither of them is available / defined it's considered a NULL value which is excluded from calculations regarding automation rates the type of performance for that event is not defined. However, NULL values are included in the calculation of total events. So the calculation is:  total events = automated events + manual events + events with NULL values.
Manual Events =  Event Created By User Type => dialog
Automated Events = Event Created By User Type => System or Service

children.name: Overview
AVG Automation Rate Overall
children.description: Percentage of Automated Events

children.name: Process Discovery
Automation Rate Over Time
children.description: Percentage of Automated Events based on Invoice Posting Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  (SUM(
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            (
              "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')
            )
        )
    ))
    / SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))
  )*100) AS "Percentage of automated events"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Vendor Creates Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: AVG Automation Rate of Invoice Events
children.description: Automation Rate of all Events including and Invoice, such as  'Create Invoice', 'Clear Invoice' and 'Reverse Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM(
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT("case_id") FILTER (
          WHERE
            (
              "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')
              AND (
                event_name LIKE '%Create Invoice%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Create Credit Memo%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Post Invoice%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Post Credit Memo%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Clear Invoice%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Clear Credit Memo%'
                OR event_name LIKE '%Reverse Invoice%'
              )
            )
        )
    )
  ) / SUM(
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT("case_id") FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name LIKE '%Create Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Create Credit Memo%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Post Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Post Credit Memo%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Clear Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Clear Credit Memo%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Reverse Invoice%'
            AND "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
        )
    )
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Automation Rate of Payment Events
children.description: Automation Rate of Events including a a 'Payment', such as  'Payment Proposal' and 'Payment Posting'

children.name: AVG Automation Rate of Posting Events
children.description: Automation Percentage of all Events including a 'Posting', such as 'Post Invoice', 'Payment Posting' and 'Post Credit Memo'

children.name: Deep Dive
Overall AVG Automation Rate
children.description: Percentage of Automated Events

children.name: Automation Rate grouped by Company Code
children.description: Automation rate grouped by Company Code - Top 20

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))) * 100 AS "Automation rate in %",
    "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST 
LIMIT 20

children.name: Focus Areas for Automation Potential
children.description: This table shows the most frequent transitions between events or states. It allows a focus on flows of events with a high average lead time, which are interesting for automation.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	Event_Name AS "Event Name", 
    "Following event",
    COUNT(Event_Name) AS "Occurence",
    COUNT(event_name) FILTER(
    	WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))
    / COUNT("event_name") * 100 AS "Automation Rate in %",
    
    AVG(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "AVG Lead Time",
    MIN(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "MIN Lead Time",
    MAX(Event_Cycle_Time) AS "MAX Lead Time"
    
FROM (
	SELECT
    	Event_Name,
        LEAD(Event_Name) OVER () AS "Following event",
        LEAD(End_Time) OVER (PARTITION BY Case_Id) - End_Time AS Event_Cycle_Time,
        "Event Created By User Type"
	FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS) 
) AS sub_query_Event_Cycle_Time
WHERE 
	"Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
    AND event_name NOT LIKE '%Due Date%' AND event_name NOT LIKE '%Vendor%'
    AND "Following event" NOT LIKE '%Due Date%' AND "Following event" NOT LIKE '%Vendor%'
    AND Event_name <> "Following event"
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 3 DESC

children.name: Number of Automated vs Manual Events sorted by Event Frequency
children.description: The overview shows how often an event was performed manually and automated

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(event_name) AS "Cases",
  "event_name" AS "Event Name",
  CASE
    WHEN "Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog' THEN 'Manual'
    WHEN "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service') THEN 'Automated'
    ELSE 'undefined'
  END AS "Automation"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE
  "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  2,
  3
ORDER BY
  1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT
  10

children.name: Total Number of Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(event_name)
    
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Automation per Individual Event
children.description: The table shows an overview of individual Events and their number of manual and automated performance

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	event_name AS "Event Name",
    COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS "# of Invoices",
    COUNT(event_name) AS "# of Events",
    COUNT(event_name) FILTER(
  		WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))
  		AS "# of Manual Events",
    COUNT(event_name) FILTER(
  		WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))
  		AS "# of Automated Events",
    COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))
	/ COUNT("event_name") * 100 AS "Automation Rate in %"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
	WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: Most active RPA Bots (Automation Users)
children.description: The table shows the frequency of Invoice Events of non-dialogue users. It is recommended to map RPA bot names / automation users to their official name instead of pseudonymizing them

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"Event Created By User Id",
    event_name AS "Event Name",
	COUNT(case_id) AS "# of Invoices",
    COUNT(event_name) AS "# of Events"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS )
WHERE "Event Created By User Type" != 'Dialog'
ORDER BY 4 desc

children.name: Automation Rate grouped by Plant
children.description: Automation rate grouped by Plant - Top 20

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL))) * 100 AS "Automation rate in %",
    "Last PO Item Plant Name" AS "Plant"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last PO Item Plant Name" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 20

children.name: Automated Events grouped by Company over Time
children.description: Automated Events based on occurrence over time per company.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Month",
    (SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')))))
        / SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL))) * 100
        ) 
        AS "Percentage of Automated Events"
	,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Number of Automated Events
children.description: Number of all Events performed by System or as an automated Service

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(event_name) FILTER(
    	WHERE("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')))
        
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Automation per Business Object
children.description: The table shows an overview of manual and automated Events per event group

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%PO%'
    OR event_name = 'Receive Order Confirmation' THEN 'PO events'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
    OR event_name LIKE '%Memo%' THEN 'Invoice events'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%GR%' 
    OR event_name LIKE '%Quality%' 
    OR event_name LIKE '%Goods Receipt%' THEN 'Goods Receipt'
    WHEN event_name LIKE '%Change%' 
    OR event_name LIKE '%Update%' 
    OR event_name LIKE '%Set%' 
    OR event_name LIKE '%Remove%' THEN 'Change Events'
    ELSE event_name
  END AS "Group of Events",
  COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS "# of Invoices",
  COUNT(event_name) AS "# of Events",
  COUNT(event_name) FILTER(
  	WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))
  	AS "# of Manual Events",
  COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
    WHERE
      "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')
  ) / COUNT("event_name") * 100 AS "Automation Rate in %"
FROM
  FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
	WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  3 DESC

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for automated Invoice Clearing
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting to Clearing an Invoice (automatically done)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for manual Invoice Clearing
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting to Clearing an Invoice (manually done)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Automation Rate for Payments grouped by Payment Method
children.description: Automation Rate by Last Inv. Item Payment Method - Top 20

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND event_name = 'Payment Proposal' OR event_name = 'Payment Posting')))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
        AND event_name = 'Payment Proposal' OR event_name = 'Payment Posting'))) 
        * 100 AS "Automation rate in %",
    "Last Inv. Item Payment Method" AS "Payment Method"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Payment Method" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 20

children.name: Automation Rate for Invoice Posting grouped by Document Type
children.description: Automation rate by Invoice Document Type - Top 20

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND event_name = 'Post Invoice' OR event_name = 'Post Credit Memo' OR event_name = 'Payment Posting')))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (WHERE "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL
    	        AND event_name = 'Post Invoice' OR event_name = 'Post Credit Memo' OR event_name = 'Payment Posting'))) * 100 AS "Automation rate in %",
    "Inv. Document Type" AS "Document Type"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Document Type" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 20

children.name: Automated Posting Events grouped by Document over time
children.description: Percentage of automated Posting Events by Invoice Document Type over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Month",
    (SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Post Invoice' AND ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')))))
        / SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Post Invoice' AND "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL))) * 100
        ) 
        AS "Percentage of Automated Events"
	,"Inv. Document Type" AS "Document Type"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Inv. Company Code Text" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: AVG Cycle Time to Clear Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting an Invoice to Clearing it

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average Payment Cycle Time of Invoices with Payments after reaching the Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all Invoices from Posting to Clearing before their Due Date was reached (On-Time Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: Manual AVG Cycle Time to Clear Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Posting an Invoice to Clearing it manually

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Manual AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average payment cycle time for Late Payments based on manual Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')
        ))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: Manual AVG Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average payment Cycle Time for On-Time Payments (before reaching the invoice due date), based on manual Events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
			AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
          	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('Dialog'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: Automated AVG Cycle Time to Clear Invoices
children.description: Average cycle time from posting an invoice to clearing it, based on automated events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Automated AVG Automated Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average cycle time for Late Payments, based on automated events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: AVG Automated Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average cycle time for On-Time Payments, based on automated events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        	AND "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: Automated Payment Events grouped by Payment Method Over Time
children.description: This overview shows the percentage of automated payment events by Last Inv. Item Payment Method over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Month",
    (SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Post Invoice' AND ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')))))
        / SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Post Invoice' AND "Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL))) * 100
        ) 
        AS "Percentage of Automated Events"
	,"Last Inv. Item Payment Method" AS "Payment Method"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Payment Method" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Take Action
Action Recommendations (Links are marked in blue)
children.description: Please find recommendations behind the links  (marked in blue)

blocks.text: Purchase Order:
Automation Execution: Discover and run automation, and get information about automation runs.
Purchase Order Confirmations: Automatically performs the Purchase Order Confirmations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

Procure to Order: The content package includes Purchase Requisition Approval, Release, and Purchase Order creation. This includes Purchase Requisition approvals at the Items level, Header level, and Purchase Order creation.
SAP Business Accelerator Hub: Gain real-time process visibility and insight-to-action in your procurement operations.
Create Purchase Requisitions from Excel: Enables mass creation of Purchase Requisitions in SAP S/4HANA systems based on an Excel input template.
Invoice:

Manage Purchase Order Approval and Creation: Automate and manage the approvals and creation of Purchase Orders in SAP ERP with approvals performed in SAP Workflow Management or SAP Build Process Automation.
Manage Customer Refund Request: Enables automating Customer Refund Request in a flexible and transparent way using automatic/manual decisions in SAP SAP S/4HANA.
Payment:
Check Invoice Payment: Fetch the invoice payment status from SAP S/4HANA and send the result to SAP Build Process Automation or SAP Workflow Management

children.name: Recommendations for action based on sub-process events and their rates of automation
children.description: The table calculates all automated events as rate per business object to provide improvement recommendations

dataSource.query:
SELECT
-- Purchase Order
CASE
	WHEN(SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '% PO%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Purchase Order%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Order Confirmation%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE "event_name" LIKE '% PO%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Purchase Order%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Order Confirmation%'
        )))) 
    >= 0.7 
	THEN 'Automation rate is above 70%. No action needed.'
	WHEN (SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '% PO%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Purchase Order%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Order Confirmation%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE "event_name" LIKE '% PO%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Purchase Order%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Order Confirmation%'
        ))))
    >= 0.4
	THEN 'Automation rate is between 30% and 70%. Potential for improvement.'
	ELSE 'Automation rate is below 30%. Improvement highly recommended.'
END AS "Purchase Order",



-- Invoice
CASE
	WHEN (SUM((SELECT COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Memo%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Memo%'
        ))))
    >= 0.7 
	THEN 'Automation rate is above 70%. No action needed.'
	WHEN (SUM((SELECT COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Memo%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE '%Invoice%'
            OR event_name LIKE '%Memo%'
        ))))
    >= 0.3
	THEN 'Automation rate is between 30% and 70%. Potential for improvement.'
	ELSE 'Automation rate is below 30%. Improvement highly recommended.'
END AS "Invoice",

-- Payment 
CASE
	WHEN(
		SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '%Payment Proposal%'
        	OR event_name LIKE '%Payment Posting%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE '%Payment Proposal%'
        	OR event_name LIKE '%Payment Posting%'))))
    >= 0.7 
	THEN 'Automation rate is above 70%. No action needed.'
	WHEN (SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
        AND (event_name LIKE '%Payment Proposal%'
        	OR event_name LIKE '%Payment Posting%'
        )))))
		/ SUM((SELECT COUNT(Distinct "Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
		WHERE event_name LIKE '%Payment Proposal%'
        	OR event_name LIKE '%Payment Posting%'))))
    >= 0.3
	THEN 'Automation rate is between 30% and 70%. Potential for improvement.'
	ELSE 'Automation rate is below 30%. Improvement highly recommended.'
END AS "Payment"


FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Case Details
Case Details
children.description: The table shows all cases including important Details to be considered for Automation purposes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Document Number"
,"Inv. Company Code" AS "Company Code"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year" AS "Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Name"
,"Event Created By User Id" AS "Involved Users"
,event_name AS "Name of Event"
,"Event Created By User Type" AS "User Type"

-- aggregated KPIs
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 500
